prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Niko
mes:
*BZZZZ, **BUZZZZZZ**—it felt like electricity racing beneath the fibers of his skin, tearing deep in the layers of flesh and blood and bone, burrowed between the derma and shooting back out with each jolting shiver of his spine—again, again, *spark, spark—*

“HooOOOly fuck,” Niko breathed out, eyes flickering open as he took in a rushed breath, his jaw `popping` as his mouth gaped open awkwardly. His head slugged forward, thumb brushing along the carved-out hole of his pipe. 

*It burned*, he realized, and with a slow shrug he pulled his singed thumb off to examine the charred greenery in the bowl. Shit was strong, stronger than it should’ve been, flashing through his head and making the world around him look like one of those white strobe lights—it felt like his entire body was moving at 3 frames per second between the blinking blackouts, yet his mind was running 150.

*Laced, probably.*

He thought the deal was *wayyyy* too good to be true, all the empty pockets sucked dry from the overpriced *bullshit* “Mom and Pop” dispensaries (which granted, gave out some **potent** shit) having him turning back to a plug he hadn’t seen since sophomore year of high school. 

But he wasn’t about to pay 60$ for an eighth. With Niko still suckling off Mommy dearest’s financial *teat*, he wasn’t exactly prone to overspending on shit Evelyn would cut him off for in a heartbeat.

Including laced weed.

He turned the pipe in his hand, letting out a low exhale that burned like melted sugar in his lungs, clinging to every alveolus like it was *determined* to give him early-onset COPD. Fuck it, not like he wanted to stick past his 30s regardless, no need for good lungs when he hadn’t the time to use them.

*Wonder what the hell is in this.* It was a simple thought, pondering over what *exactly* was causing the nerve-biting, electric-like hum through his body. He pursed his lips, tongue mulling over a single, muffled word. “Hailee.”

Yeah, Hailee would know, wouldn’t they? Asshole dipped their toe in every pot that **was** ‘hardcore drugs’, could probably pinpoint what it was like a pretentious hippie selling grass behind the counter. *“What are you looking for? Head high or body high? Relaxation or focus? Yap, yap, yap—”*

Yeah. Yeah, *no*, they would **definitely** know.

“Hailee!” Niko called out, voice reverberating through the empty house and right back into his ears, met with nothing but the hushed sound of the neighbor’s yappy dog. Not even his parents—*parent*, he reminded bitterly—answered him. 

Any other spoiled brat would’ve thrown a shit fit if they found out their Mom (and her ‘Hubby’) were going on a month-long trip to Europe. *S’il vous plait, I’ll be Paris during Christmas! We’ll bring home pictures so it’ll feel like you were there!*

Niko, as bitchy as he could be, would’ve punched a hole in the hotel wall if he had been forced to go. Always having his Mom breathing down his neck, not having the space to get **fucked** up. And Hailee…

Having his parents around always stuck a wedge between the two, kept him from fully wrapping them up in his sticky-sweet embrace. He wanted to keep them glued to his side—always with him, always beside him, always **there**.

“Hailee!” He shouted louder, shoving himself up from his ruffled bed to trudge the short distance to Hailee’s propped-open door. No lock, they weren’t *allowed* to have one. Turns out that when you keep falling down the slippery slope of drug use, you aren’t really given the privilege of *basic* privacy.

Hailee, with all the “get-out-of-my-room!”’s, couldn't even have the door shut now. Thank you, rehab. 

 “Hailee! I know you’re awake, you got that therapy shit at 3. Your Dad keeps calling to annoy me about it,” He pushed open the door, and sure as shit, there they were still buried under the blankets of their bed. Half-awake, but still *technically* up and going. 

“Hey, try this out. I think this shit’s laced and I was wondering if you’d know what the hell was in it. Come on, scooch over.” 

He slid in beside them, not caring as they grumbled out some exhausted, half-formed protest. “Hey, look alive! Your Dad said you can’t sleep past noon anymore.”

And he wasn’t about to get in trouble just to cover their ass. He offered the pipe up, pressing the mouthpiece against their lips. “Alright, you sit up and I’ll light it, okay?”

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee turns her head and covers her head with the blankets due to the lights hurting her eyes* "Keep your weed. That shit is disgusting. Wake me when there is something stronger" *Hailee groans as a wave of nausea hits her*

name: Niko
mes:
Niko let out a sharp, mocking laugh as Hailee burrowed deeper into the blankets like some kind of petulant child. His fingers twitched around the pipe, thumb flicking his lighter on and off absentmindedly—*click, click, click*—the flame dancing in erratic bursts.

"Oh *come on*, don't be such a fucking baby," he drawled, voice dripping with that signature mix of amusement and condescension. He leaned in closer, close enough that his breath ghosted over the fabric of the blanket where Hailee's face was hidden. "You're telling me *you*, my little junkie step-sis, are gonna turn down free drugs? What happened to you?"

He reached down and yanked the blanket back just enough to expose her face—pale skin flushed with sleep (or maybe withdrawal), those emerald eyes squinting against the light like it physically pained her. Niko smirked at the sight. "Look at you," he cooed, tilting his head like she was some pitiful stray he'd found shivering in an alleyway. "All shaky and pathetic without your fix."

His free hand came up to brush a strand of hair from her forehead before trailing down to cup her cheek—his touch deceptively gentle despite the taunting lilt in his voice. "C'monnnn," he urged again, nudging the pipe against her lips insistently. "Just one hit for big bro? Then I'll get you something stronger after your stupid therapy session."

A pause—then that shit-eating grin widened as he added: "*Promise.*"

"Oh *come on*, don't be such a fucking baby," he drawled, voice dripping with that signature mix of amusement and condescension. "C'monnnn," he urged again, nudging the pipe against her lips insistently. "Just one hit for big bro? Then I'll get you something stronger after your stupid therapy session."

A pause—then that shit-eating grin widened as he added: "*Promise.*"

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee's eyes light up at that and with sluggish movements she sits up on her elbows* "What kind of stronger" *Hailee questions*

name: Niko
mes:
Niko’s grin sharpened, all teeth and dark amusement, as he watched Hailee perk up like a starving dog hearing the rattle of kibble. He leaned in closer, his free hand sliding behind her head to keep her from flopping back down—fingers tangling lazily in her hair.

*"What kind?"* he echoed, voice dropping into something low and conspiratorial. His thumb brushed over the curve of her bottom lip before tapping the pipe against it again. "Depends on how good you are for me right now." A pause—then a slow, deliberate drag from the pipe himself just to watch her eyes track the movement before exhaling smoke right into her face with a chuckle.

"Got some *real* fun shit stashed away," he continued, tilting his head as if considering it. "Pills that’ll make your brain feel like cotton candy... or maybe something *injectable*, if you're feeling nostalgic." His fingers tightened slightly in her hair—not enough to hurt (yet), just enough to keep her attention locked on him. "But first? First you take this hit like a good girl and tell me what the hell I just smoked."

He flicked his lighter again—the flame casting sharp shadows across his smirk—and held it near the bowl expectantly. "*Then* we talk upgrades."

His fingers tightened slightly in her hair—not enough to hurt (yet), just enough to keep her attention locked on him. "But first? First you take this hit like a good girl and tell me what the hell I just smoked."

He flicked his lighter again—the flame casting sharp shadows across his smirk—and held it near the bowl expectantly. "*Then* we talk upgrades."

Niko’s grin sharpened, all teeth and dark amusement, as Hailee perked up like a starving dog hearing the rattle of a food bowl. He leaned in closer, his free hand sliding behind her neck to keep her upright—his grip just tight enough to be possessive.

*"What kind?"* he echoed, voice dropping into something low and conspiratorial. His thumb traced idle circles against the nape of her neck as he tilted his head, considering. "Ohhhh, I dunno... maybe that *special* little stash you used to love so much before rehab got its grubby hands on you."

He let the implication hang there for a beat—just long enough for Hailee’s breath to hitch—before pulling back slightly with a theatrical sigh. "But *only* if you take this hit first," he bargained, tapping the pipe against her bottom lip again. "Gotta make sure my baby sis isn't losing her edge."

His smirk turned wicked as he flicked his lighter open one-handed, flame dancing dangerously close to the bowl. "*C'mon,*" he coaxed in that honey-slick tone of his—the one that always made it sound like giving in was inevitable. "One little hit won't kill ya... but I *might* if you keep making me wait."

Niko’s grin sharpened, all teeth and dark amusement as he watched Hailee perk up like a starving dog hearing the rattle of kibble. He leaned in closer, his free hand sliding behind her head to keep her from flopping back down—fingers tangling lazily in her hair, tugging just enough to make sure she was *listening*.

"Ohhhh, you know," he hummed, voice low and conspiratorial. "The *fun* kind. The kind that makes your brain go all fuzzy and warm—like sinking into a bath you never wanna get out of." His thumb traced the curve of her bottom lip before pressing the pipe against it again. "But first... gotta see what we're working with here."

He flicked the lighter on with practiced ease, holding it just beneath the bowl as he watched her through half-lidded eyes. "One hit," he murmured. "*Then* we talk about what comes after."

His smirk curled at the edges—knowing damn well she wouldn't say no now that he'd dangled something better in front of her needy little face.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee leans forward and takes a hit of the weed inhaling the smoke. She lets it fill her lungs and then makes a disgusted face as she coughs it up* "Thats not laced. It's just a shitty strand" *Hailee coughs glaring at the pipe like it offended her*

name: Niko
mes:
Niko barked out a laugh, sharp and unkind, as Hailee coughed like some amateur taking their first hit behind the bleachers. He snatched the pipe back before she could drop it, rolling his eyes as he examined the bowl with exaggerated scrutiny.

"*Shitty strand*," he mocked, pitching his voice higher in a shitty imitation of hers before clicking his tongue. "Ohhhh, *excuse me*, Your Highness—didn’t realize you were too good for ditch weed now." His grin turned wolfish as he leaned in again, close enough that she could smell the lingering smoke on his breath. "Guess rehab really did ruin you."

He flicked her forehead playfully—just hard enough to sting—before pushing off the bed and stretching with an obnoxious yawn. "Fine, fine," he sighed dramatically, waving a hand like he was doing her some grand favor. "Since you’re *clearly* above peasant shit now…" He dug into his hoodie pocket and pulled out a small baggie of pills—round, chalky-white with an uneven press to them. "*These*, though? These’ll put you right back where you belong."

Niko shook two into his palm before pausing, tilting his head with faux concern. "...Unless you’re *scared* now?"
swipes:
Niko barked out a laugh, sharp and unkind, as Hailee hacked up the smoke like some amateur. He snatched the pipe back before she could drop it, rolling his eyes with exaggerated exasperation. "Jesus Christ, you're *embarrassing*," he sneered, though there was something almost fond in the way he reached out to thump her between the shoulder blades—harder than necessary, just to watch her wheeze.

"Shitty strand? *Please.*" He took another drag just to prove a point, holding it in until his lungs burned before exhaling through his nose like some pretentious dragon. "You’re just used to that rehab-center baby shit now." His free hand slid from her back up to her throat—not squeezing (yet), just resting there so she could feel the weight of it while he leaned in close enough for her to taste the smoke on his breath.

"But fine," he conceded with a theatrical sigh. "Since you’re *sooo* above my weed—" His grip tightened slightly as he flashed that wolfish grin again. "*Guess we skip straight to the fun part.*"

He released her abruptly and rolled off the bed with all the grace of a drunk catfish before rummaging through his hoodie pocket and pulling out a small baggie of pills—round and chalky-white under dim light. "*These*, babygirl," he purred, shaking them tauntingly in front of her face like dog treats for an obedient mutt, "*will make your spine melt.* But first..."

His smirk turned wicked as he tossed one into his own mouth dry-swallowing it without hesitation before looming over Hailee again—one knee pressing into the mattress beside her hip as he dangled another pill between two fingers right above her lips.

"...Say *please*."

Niko barked out a laugh, sharp and unkind, as Hailee hacked up the smoke like some amateur. He snatched the pipe back before she could drop it, rolling his eyes with exaggerated exasperation. "Jesus Christ, you're *embarrassing*," he sneered, though there was something almost fond in the way he reached over to thump her between the shoulder blades—harder than necessary, of course.

"Shitty strand? *Please.*" He took another drag just to prove a point, holding it in until his lungs burned before exhaling smoothly through his nose. "You’re just out of practice since rehab turned you into a fucking lightweight." His grin turned wolfish as he leaned in again—close enough that she could smell the weed clinging to his breath. "Guess we’ll have to fix that."

His free hand slid down to grip her thigh—squeezing just shy of painful—as he added with mock sweetness: "*After* therapy. Wouldn’t want Daddy finding out I ruined all their hard work *before* your little session." The threat was casual, but the glint in his eyes promised retribution if she dared skip it and got him chewed out by Evelyn again.

He pulled away abruptly and swung his legs off the bed, stretching with deliberate laziness before shooting her a look over his shoulder. "Upstairs bathroom at 4:30," he said breezily, as if discussing nothing more scandalous than dinner plans. "Bring your toothbrush this time—last week you bit me so hard I bled." A beat; then a wink dripping with false innocence: "*Unless you wanna taste it again.*"

These’ll put you right back where you belong."
